description: The BR-34 District Transport Office (DTO) serves as the primary regulatory body for vehicle registration and licensing in the Khagaria district of Bihar. Located within the Munger Division, the office manages transport logistics and road safety enforcement for several blocks situated at the confluence of the Ganga and Gandak rivers. It is responsible for the issuance of driving licenses, vehicle permits, and the collection of road taxes for the local population.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, DTO Road, Ward No. 15, Khagaria, Bihar
